Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've made your mind up, <MYNAME>? You
really kept me waiting!
<PAGE>
I won't ask what you've been worrying
over, but let me tell you something -
I'll be by your side from now on!
<PAGE>
If something's bothering you again, you
should come and talk to me. That's how
marriage works, okay?
<PAGE>
Come then, <MYNAME>. Show me the Blue
Feather again.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Marry me!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<FACE_LOVE>I love you, my Princess. I'll make you
the happiest woman in the whole wide
world!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We need to let everyone in town know
that we are getting married. Let's go,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! You two are finally tying the knot,
are you? That's great! Congrats to you
both!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations! You be sure and make
<MYNAME> happy, Allen, you hear me?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Come on, just who do you think I am?
I'll take your advice once you've got a
wife of your own!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>On that note, Dunhill, we
would be honored if you would lead the
wedding ceremony for us.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I will! <MYNAME> has done so
much for the town, after all!
<PAGE>
If you're really okay with my old mug
being the one to do it, I'd be honored!
Anything else you need?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll get everything ready for the
ceremony! You might not think it to look
at me, but I've got a sensitive side!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'll also get your clothing sorted for
the big day. I'll let you know when it's
ready, Allen.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about the date of the wedding?
Considering the date today, what do you
two think about <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes, that will be fine. Dunhill, Rod,
thanks for your help.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
So, on <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>, you will finally,
truly be mine, <MYNAME>! I simply cannot
wait, my Princess.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've decided to marry me? I'm so
happy, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I've been doing everything I can to
become the type of man you would want
to marry.
<PAGE>
I'm sure the new me can make you so much
happier than the old me ever could have!
So don't worry about anything!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, thank for you choosing me.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm going to give myself completely to
you! So please, give yourself completely
to me, too, okay?
<PAGE>
Oh, <MYNAME>! I love you more than
anything!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now we need to go and tell the folks in
town. Tell them that we're getting
married!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! You two are finally tying the knot,
are you? That's great! Congrats to you
both!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great news, Rod. There's aren't many
like <MYNAME> out there, I can tell you
that! Hold on tight to her!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You bet I will! Once we're married we'll
even be holding hands in our sleep!
Thanks for the kind words, Allen.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>On that note, Dunhill. We'd like you to
be the one who marries us. Will you do
us that honor?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I will! <MYNAME> has done so
much for the town, after all!
<PAGE>
If you're really okay with my old mug
being the one to do it, I'd be honored
myself! Anything else you need?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll be the one to get everything ready
for the ceremony, then. I'll make it
the best wedding ever, of course.
<PAGE>
I'll also get your clothing ready for
the big day. I'll bring it to you, Rod,
once I've got it sorted.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about the date of the wedding?
Considering the date today, what do you
two think about <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If my bride is okay with that date,
then I have no problem with it either.
Thanks for all of this, both of you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>! It seems
too far away! I can't wait to see
what a lovely bride you will be!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I normally quite enjoy waiting for
things, but I admit it. I've been very
nervous about waiting for your answer!
<PAGE>
I'm so glad you've decided to marry me,
not because that's what I want, but 
because it's what you want, too!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>. Let's get
married!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
There is someone for everyone, just like
they say. I'm so happy that we met!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, <MYNAME>, we need to go and let
everyone know we are to be married!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I wonder how they'll react when they
hear about it. There is something of an
age gap between us!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! You two are finally tying the knot,
are you? A gap in age means nothing to
true love, does it! Congrats!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My congratulations, too. Soseki, <MYNAME>,
I hope you are very happy together.
<PAGE>
Soseki, I hope you will use the wisdom
of your significantly greater years to
steer the both of you to happiness!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you both. I'll do my very best
to keep <MYNAME> happy! You'll see!
<PAGE>
Now then, Dunhill. Can we ask you to
perform the ceremony itself?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I will! <MYNAME> has done so
much for the town, after all!
<PAGE>
If you're really okay with my old mug
being the one to do it, I'd be honored
myself! Anything else you need?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll be the one to get everything ready
for the ceremony. I'll bring together
all you could ever need for a wedding.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about the date of the wedding?
Considering the date today, what do you
two think about <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's fine with us too. Sorry for all
the trouble, both of you, but thank you
so much for helping out!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Come then, <MYNAME>. Let us make the most
of the time before we are married, too!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm so happy. I can't think of anything
else to say.
<PAGE>
I wasn't sure we would be much of a
match, <MYNAME>, so I've been quite
worried about your answer.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>. I want to marry you. Please,
give me that Blue Feather.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>. I'll be by your side forever.
Let us live happily together.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Shall we go and tell the people in the
town about our engagement. Please,
<MYNAME>, give me your hand.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! You two are finally tying the knot,
are you? That's great! Congrats to you
both!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, Sanjay. <MYNAME>, please
look after him, okay?
<PAGE>
I've known Sanjay for a long time, after
all. We're practically family! I'm as
happy as if I were getting married!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much, Master Amir,
Master Dunhill. I am so happy to hear
you say that.
<PAGE>
Now, Master Dunhill, I have a request
for you. Will you please do us the honor
of conducting the ceremony?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I will! <MYNAME> has done so
much for the town, after all!
<PAGE>
If you're really okay with my old mug
being the one to do it, I'd be honored
myself! Anything else you need?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Then allow me to get everything ready
for the ceremony. You'll need clothes,
too, so I'll handle that as well!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about the date of the wedding?
Considering the date today, what do you
two think about <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That sounds perfect. I hope this all
isn't too much trouble for you both!
You have our eternal gratitude.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>. It looks like this will be
a wonderful wedding, doesn't it! I can't
wait for the day to come!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Are you sure, <MYNAME>? Sure that I'm the
one you want?
<PAGE>
I'm brash, I've got a temper, I'm really
picky and I'm bad at cooking, too. You
think I'll make a good husband?
<PAGE>
In fact, you already turned me down
once, didn't you? Just make sure you
aren't going to have any regrets!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Okay, okay. I do want to marry you,
of course I do. Enough chatter, let's
just do this!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your proposal really made me glad, to
tell you the truth. I'm gonna make you
happy if it's the last thing I do!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go into town, <MYNAME>. We're gonna
need some help if we're gonna pull this
thing off.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! You two are finally tying the knot,
are you? That's great! Congrats to you
both!
<PAGE>
Neil, I'm so glad you've found this
chance for happiness. Look after your
new family, you hear me?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You've been dating much longer than a
lot of these young people do now a days,
which certainly shows commitment.
<PAGE>
I'm sure the two of you will make a
lovely life for yourselves. Take care
of each other!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We will. I hope you will all keep on
watching over us!
<PAGE>
Something else, Dunhill. Can we ask you
to perform the ceremony?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I will! You and <MYNAME> have
done so much for the town, after all!
<PAGE>
If you're really okay with my old mug
being the one to do it, I'd be honored
myself! Anything else you need?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let me prepare the ceremony, then.
You'll need clothing, too, won't you.
<PAGE>
It's been a while since we had a wedding
in town, so I'll pull out all the stops!
You can expect a great celebration!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about the date of the wedding?
Considering the date today, what do you
two think about <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That sounds great. I want to give her
a real special day. Thanks, both of you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, it isn't long until we'll be
married! Be careful until the big day!
We don't want the bride to get injured!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Sorry about that. I was so happy I
couldn't find the words.
<PAGE>
They say that all good things come to
those who wait, so I was trying not to
worry too much about your reply.
<PAGE>
But it looks like I was fooling myself!
Phew, I'm so please you decided to marry
me, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Let's be happy together!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This feeling, it must be what they call
love! <MYNAME>, I'll take care of you
forever!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, <MYNAME>. We need to go and tell
everyone the good news. I need to send
a letter to my parents, too.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! You two are finally tying the knot,
are you? That's great! Congrats to you
both!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you and Amir  make each other
happy, you hear me?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Master Amir, Miss <MYNAME>!
Congratulations on your wedding!
<PAGE>
I'm so happy that Master Sanjay is now
able to marry someone he truly loves.
<PAGE>
Miss <MYNAME>, allow me to thank you from
the bottom of my heart.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you both. I'm so happy to have
your blessings.
<PAGE>
One thing, Dunhill. I'd like to hold the
ceremony here in town. Would you take
care of it, please?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I will! <MYNAME> has done so
much for the town, after all!
<PAGE>
If you're really okay with my old mug
being the one to do it, I'd be honored
myself! Anything else you need?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll prepare everything for the
ceremony, of course. That includes the
clothes that you'll wear.
<PAGE>
We have traditional clothing for a
royal wedding in our homeland, so I'll
make all the arrangements for that.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about the date of the wedding?
Considering the date today, what do you
two think about <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That sounds fine. Thank you both. I
know there isn't long until, so we
really appreciate your help.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I can't wait for our wedding.
I haven't been this excited since I
first came to town!
<PAGE>
We're going to be busy getting ready for
the big day, so let's both do our best,
okay?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, this was all so sudden. You
really surprised me!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But made me really happy, too! I've been
worried for a while now that you hadn't
proposed to me yet.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. Stay by my side from
now on! I'll make you happy, you'll see!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I love you, <MYNAME>. I always have, and I
always will.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <MYNAME>. I know this is fast, but why
don't we go into town and let everyone
know we're getting married?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! You two are finally tying the knot,
are you? That's great! Congrats to you
both!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you make Tina happy, you hear
me?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Tina, congratulations! I'm so jealous
that you get to marry <MYNAME>! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you need to make Tina happier
than anyone else in the world, okay?
You'd better! I'll be watching!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you both. You've made me so happy!
<PAGE>
Dunhill, can I ask something of you?
I want to have the wedding here in town,
could you take care of it for us?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I will! <MYNAME> has done so
much for the town, after all!
<PAGE>
If you're really okay with my old mug
being the one to do it, I'd be honored
myself! Anything else you need?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll make the other preparations for
the ceremony. I'll have Clement whip up
some extra special cookery, too! 
<PAGE>
I'll get your clothes for the ceremony
ready, too. I'll let Tina know once
they are ready!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about the date of the wedding?
Considering the date today, what do you
two think about <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm fine with that too! Thanks for all
of your help, both of you!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
A wedding, and then the wedded bliss
that will follow! I can't wait,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You looked so surprised when I asked you
to marry me the other day, and now here
you are saying you actually want to?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I've changed my mind, I'm afraid. You
won't get me to marry you any time soon!
So sorry about that, darling!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, you're not giving up? What should I
do now, then?
<PAGE>
Let me see....
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Okay then. I'll marry you.
<PAGE>
You have to do everything I say, though,
understand? Everything! I hope you can
keep up! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You'll make me the happiest wife in
the world, won't you? I'm looking
forward to it so much! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's go and tell everyone else right
away! We'll need some help getting
things ready, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I wonder how they'll all react? Can't
wait to find out!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! You two are finally tying the knot,
are you? That's great! Congrats to you
both!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you make Michelle happy, you
hear me?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Michelle, congratulations. You look so
happy! You've made me happy too!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, both of you. I'm so happy I
don't think I'll ever get this smile off
my face!
<PAGE>
It's all thanks to the proposal from
<MYNAME>! I'm so grateful! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
Oh, something else, Dunhill. Can you
conduct the ceremony for us? There's no
one else we can ask.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I will! <MYNAME> has done so
much for the town, after all!
<PAGE>
If you're really okay with my old mug
being the one to do it, I'd be honored
myself! Anything else you need?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll prepare the ceremony for you....
the clothing too. I'll make it.
Something to... look forward to.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about the date of the wedding?
Considering the date today, what do you
two think about <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great, thank you!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You've all been so kind. Thanks so much!
I'm so happy, <MYNAME>. <RED>∀</RED> I can't wait to
get married to you!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Your proposal... made me really happy.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>... Will you propose to me again?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... Thank you for choosing me.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Spring, summer, fall and winter...
Morning, afternoon, evening, night...
<PAGE>
We'll be together forever now... I
promise.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I need to let my mother know, too.
I'm sure she'll be... happy.
<MYNAME>, let's go.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! You two are finally tying the knot,
are you? That's great! Congrats to you
both!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you make Yuri happy, you hear
me?

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You still seem so young to me, but I
guess its time for the chick to leave
the nest. Congratulations, Yuri.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you'd better take good care of
my darling daughter! I'm sure you'll be
very happy together.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you. Thanks you... so much.
<PAGE>
Mr. Dunhill... would you please perform
the ceremony? We need... your help.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I will! <MYNAME> has done so
much for the town, after all!
<PAGE>
If you're really okay with my old mug
being the one to do it, I'd be honored
myself! Anything else you need?

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can leave getting the ceremony ready
to me, my dear! I'll do my best to make
it a wonderful day!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about the date of the wedding?
Considering the date today, what do you
two think about <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
...Perfect. Thank you both.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... I'll make our clothing for the
ceremony. Something else you can...
look forward to.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>. You really want to marry me?
<PAGE>
All I could think was that there was no
way you'd ever want to marry me! That's
all I could think!
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>So having you propose to me, well, it's
like a dream come true!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>. I will accept
your proposal, gladly.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm full of happy feelings! <MYNAME>, I
love you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Shall we go and let everyone in town
know about our good news? Come on,
<MYNAME>, let's go.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! You two are finally tying the knot,
are you? That's great! Congrats to you
both!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you make Iroha happy, you hear
me?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Iroha, congratulations! I'm so jealous
of you, getting married! You'd better
be super happy, you hear?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dunhill, Tina, thank you both. We're
going to be happy, don't worry!
<PAGE>
Dunhill, can I ask you something? Would
you please perform the ceremony for us?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course I will! <MYNAME> has done so
much for the town, after all!
<PAGE>
If you're really okay with my old mug
being the one to do it, I'd be honored
myself! Anything else you need?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can leave setting up the ceremony to
me! I've got skills when it comes to
things like this. You can count on me!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about the date of the wedding?
Considering the date today, what do you
two think about <BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE>?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm sorry for asking so much, when
you're so busy. Thank you so much.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm going to start ordering all my
things and packing up for the move.
<PAGE>
I can't wait, <MYNAME>!
<BLUE><MOJI0> <MOJI1></BLUE> 
couldn't come any sooner!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
That night of the proposal, I have to
tell you, I cried my eyes out. I so
wanted to get married...
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I've been cutting back on snacking from
the menu, hoping it'll help me get
married sooner, and I think it's worked!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so happy I think I'm going to cry,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I love you, <MYNAME>. I'm going to whisper
that in your ear every day from now on!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I want to go and tell Clement about this
big news! Would you come with me?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! You two are finally tying the knot,
are you? That's great! Congrats to you
both!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you make Felicity happy, you
hear me?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so happy! Felicity, salutations!
It's my treat tonight, then!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Clement, Dunhill, thank you both so
much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now, about the actual wedding...
will you perform the service, Dunhill?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
